name: Gabber Piet
description: '''Gabber Piet''', whose real name is '''Piet van Dolen''' (born in 1966), is a Dutch singer and producer of [[gabber]] music. He was part of the gabber scene in the mid-1990s, where he became a prominent figure for a time. However, he eventually fell into disgrace due to an unfortunate parody called ''Hakke en Zage''.
